ygData.subject: High Keep & High Pass
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering, lately in both HP & HK when I go to a shop owner he/she tells me things like You make me sick, now leave my shop and won t buy from me or
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering, lately in both HP & HK when I go to a shop owner he/she
tells me things like "You make me sick, now leave my shop" and won't buy
from me or sell to me at all. I use to be able to till about a few weeks
back, I've been turning in Orc scalps and goblin ears for faction but as of
now I still get the "I dislike you" from the shop owners. Anyone have any
ideas? Only thing I remember killing the said made my faction worse with HP
ppl was a DE in Qeynos and I only killed him like 1 - 2 times.

***************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 22 Human Cleric of The Rathe
***************************
